scripts.create:server:certificate: cd conf; openssl genrsa -out webapp2-server.key 2048 && openssl req -new -key webapp2-server.key -out webapp2-server.csr -subj "/C=JP/ST=Tokyo/L=Tokyo/CN=localhost" && openssl x509 -in webapp2-server.csr -days 3650 -req -signkey webapp2-server.key > webapp2-server.crt
scripts.stop: docker stop app; docker rm app
